title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4003.22 - Erection, removal of structures
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4003.22 - Erection, removal of structures

State Regulations

The erection of buildings, seating stands or other
structures on the grounds of any racing association and the alteration or the
removal of any such structures shall be made only with the written approval of
the commission and the issuance of a permit, after the filing with the
commission of a description of such improvements, detailed plans of them and a
detailed statement of their cost. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4003.22

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
